changeSet.author: Supriya
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Psychiatrist mhGAP Assessment form

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Initial","Follow-up","Discharge") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Type of assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Type of assessment

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Individual session","Family support session","Joint session with med/physio") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Type of activity");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Type of activity

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Normal","Borderline mentally ill","Midly ill","Moderately ill","Markedly ill","Severely ill","Among the most extremely ill") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Severity of symptoms (CGI-S scale)");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Severity of symptoms (CGI-S scale)

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Very much improved","Much improved","Minimally improved","No change","Minimally worse","Very much worse") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Improvement / outcomes (CGI-I scale)");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Improvement / outcomes (CGI-I scale)

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Depression","Anxiety","Trauma related","Psychosis","Behavioral/substance","Behavioral","Neurocognitive","Psychosomatic / MUPS","Epilepsy / seizure") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Syndrome");

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Depression","Anxiety","Trauma related","Psychosis","Behavioral/substance","Behavioral","Neurocognitive","Psychosomatic / MUPS","Epilepsy / seizure") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Secondary Syndrome");

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes","No: Assessment without follow-up") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Does the patient need a follow-up?");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Does the patient need a follow-up?

changeSet.author: Supriya
changeSet.sql:
SELECT concept_source_id INTO @source_id FROM concept_reference_source where name = 'CEIL';
call CREATE_REFERENCE_MAPPING_CEIL("PA, Date of consultation","162869");

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("PA, Date of consultation","PA, Type of assessment","PA, Type of activity","PA, Severity of symptoms (CGI-S scale)","PA, Improvement / outcomes (CGI-I scale)","PA, General comment about session","PA, PHQ9","PA, GAD 7","PA, Comment on the screening tool","PA, Syndrome","PA, Secondary Syndrome","PA, Does the patient need a follow-up?","PA, Summary of MSE (mental state examination)","PA, Treatment plan") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PA, Psychiatrist-mhGAP Assessment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Set Members to Psychiatrist-mhGAP Assessment

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='PA, Psychiatrist-mhGAP Assessment' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set members to all observation templates
